short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to fetch and analyze meta tags of the current webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meta Mine is a powerful yet lightweight Chrome extension designed to seamlessly fetch and analyze meta tags from any web page you visit. Whether you're a web developer, SEO professional, or digital marketer, Meta Mine empowers you to uncover key metadata insights in real-time.

With Meta Mine, you can:
★ Instantly view all meta tags, including titles, descriptions, content type, and more.
★ Collect data about internal links, external links, broken links, response time & indexability to improve your SEO performance.
★ Detect missing tags to optimize your web pages.
★ Calculate readability score to know how easy or difficult the content of your web page  is to read, allowing you to take measures for enhanced audience engagement.
★ Get a clear and organized report with one click.

Meta Mine is your go-to tool for enhancing online visibility and fine-tuning your digital strategy. Make your every web page count with Meta Mine!
